name: Wathitdew Game Bundle
description:
The complete itch.io Wathitdew™ games library for 25% off! The Wathitdew™ Game Bundle includes :
  • 1. Adventure Field™ 4
  • 2. Aeternum Quest™
  • 3. PROJECT : KNIGHT™
  • 4. PROJECT : KNIGHT™ 2 Dusk of Souls
  • 5. Shadow Fear™ Path to Insanity
  • 6. Wathitdew Record™ Game Studio BATTLEFIELD


System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800) or equivalent / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) or equivalent
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670, GeForce GTX 200 series with at least 1GB
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
    • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
    • Storage: 800 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c sound device
    • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
Languages Interface Full Audio Subtitles English ✔ ✔ ✔ French X
X
X

These games are the propriety of Wathitdew Record™. All assets used in these games are all handmade, purchased, free or are all ok to be used as stated by their creator from where they been downloaded. All due credits are at the end of the games. Have a great time playing our games!
